findings.title: #1 Weak PRNG
findings.description: Do not use `block.timestamp`, `now` or `blockhash` as a source of randomness. There are services to generate random numbers in Smart contracts like Chainlink VRF.

findings.title: #1 Contract doesn’t import npm packages from source
findings.description: The contract does not directly import npm packages from their source, potentially leading to dependency issues and vulnerabilities.

findings.title: #2 A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is „“^0.8.0””.

findings.title: #3 Missing Zero Address Validation
findings.description: Check that the address is not zero
